Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary

BLAdd39574.Transcription:
MArye goddis modir dereSocoure & helpe us while we ben
                    hereGouerne wisse and redeAs þou art modir mayden and
                    wijfClense us fro synne and graunte good lijfAnd helpe us in oure
                    nede
